question: Can the Corp trigger [Jinteki: Restoring Humanity](/en/card/30043) if they have no facedown cards in Archives for most of their turn, but they discard cards to their maximum hand size?

answer: We sometimes write abilities with “when your discard phase ends” to emphasize that they resolve after your hand size is checked. There is no difference in timing or functionality between this wording and “when your turn ends”.
question: What’s the difference between "when your discard phase ends" and "when your turn ends"?
